Columns.Name: PromotionOfferId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Promotion Offer. The Promotion Offer ID is unique to each account or party that is offered to.

Columns.Name: PromotionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionOfferValidStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period start timestamp that the offer is valid or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: PromotionOfferValidEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period end timestamp that the offer is valid or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: LoyaltyProgramId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Loyalty Program.

Columns.Name: LoyaltyAccountId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Loyalty Account.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.
